fixes.name: Tenor Vega
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR DaysDiff = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[RISK_DATE] - 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE]
RETURN
IF(
    YEAR('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[RISK_DATE]) = 1980,
    "Parallel",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 30, "1M",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 61, "2M",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 91, "3M",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 182, "6M",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 365, "1Y",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 730, "2Y",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 1095, "3Y",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 1461, "4Y",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 1826, "5Y",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 2557, "7Y",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 3652, "10Y",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 5479, "15Y",
    IF(DaysDiff <= 7306, "20Y",
    IF(DaysDiff > 7306, ">20Y", "Error")))))))))))))))
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level nested IF logic to a calculated column. The dependent calculated field [Risk Date # of Days] was inlined as 'RISK_DATE' - 'EFFECTIVE_DATE' and all column references were converted to the 'TableName'[Column] format. YEAR(...) check preserved and string literals kept in double quotes.
